text.p: The following are the leading stories in the Maltese press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Government planning new management structure for state hospitals to give them more autonomy.
- Government discussing new scheme for waste disposal. Disused quarries to be used for disposal of building debris.
- General Workers' Union delegation in London talks over De La Rue factory in Malta. The international banknote printing firm has temporarily suspended 63 employees for lack of work.
- Russian youth caught with cocaine in his shoe soles.
